column2: Recently completed a systematic review of the use of synthetic controls in health evaluations
Clincially trained epidemiologist, interest in methodology, taught on epidemiological methods for over two decades
Based at MRC/CSO Social and Public Health Sciences Unit, is currently researching methods to correct for non-participation bias in health surveys
Cardiologist, epidemiologist, itnerested in global health, cardiology and published using PAF methods
Previously worked on record linkage for national NHS routine healthcare data organisation. Works on novel data linkages.
Research fellow. Interested in child health and inequalities. Interested in differential effects.
